definition: (of an organ or body part) excessively enlarged as a result of increased size in the constituent cells
details:
adjective
- (of an organ or body part) excessively enlarged as a result of increased size in the constituent cells
= synonyms: hypertrophied
- enlarged to an abnormal degree
= synonyms: exaggerated, magnified
- larger than normal
= example: larger than normal
- as of a photograph
= synonyms: blown-up
